H0.text: The flag of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya was what single colour. Red

H1.text: The flag of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya was what single colour. Blue

H2.text: The flag of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya was what single colour. Yellow

H3.text: The flag of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya was what single colour. Green

A4.text: The flag of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya was an all-green flag.
